p: In conclusion, R‐High‐CHOP/CHASER including HDAC and rituximab followed by LEED HDC with ASCT showed a high CR rate and durable PFS and OS in patients aged 65 years or younger with newly diagnosed advanced MCL. This regimen compares favorably with other regimens including HDAC, rituximab, and HDC with ASCT and can now be considered a standard treatment option for newly diagnosed younger patients with MCL.
